name: PAKO 3
description:
Original car chase game is back! Pako 3 brings insane amount of levels and cars to unlcok, while keeping the simple gameplay. Escape cop on levels like you have never seen, drive fast on racing levels and challenge hard boss levels!

FEATURES:
+ Easy and addictive gameplay
+ 30+ levels and cars to unlock
+ Pick up bonus items to help your journey!
+ Unlock and paint cars
+ Leaderboard competition
+ Achievements
+ iCloud saving


MANUAL:
1) Press and hold touch screen LEFT or RIGHT sides to steer the car. Hold BOTH buttons for extra slide / handbrake.
